DataElement.preferredName: Follow-Up Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Expected Length of Time to Recover After Treatment Score 4 Point Likert Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of their expected length of time to recover after treatment using a 4-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Follow-Up Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Expected Length of Time to Recover After Treatment Score Follow-Up Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A set of questions and responses designed to evaluate an individual's self-reported expectations with the outcome of treatment._A question about an individual's expectation of the lenth of time for recovery after treatment._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A set of questions and responses designed to evaluate an individual's self-reported expectations with the outcome of treatment.

Concepts.definition: A set of questions and responses designed to evaluate an individual's self-reported expectations with the outcome of treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

DataElementConcept.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Expected Length of Time Score 4 Point Likert Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A four point ordered reference set for the subjective scoring of a person's expected length of time level that ranges from 1: It took less time than I expected to 4: I didn't know what to expect.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I didn't know what to expect.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I didn't know what to expect.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual didn't know what to expect.

Concepts.longName: Did Not Know What to Expect
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual does or didn't know what to expect.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It took longer than I expected.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It took longer than I expected.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that something took longer than expected.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that something took longer than expected.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It took the time I expected.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It took the time I expected.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that something took the time that was expected.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that something took the time that was expected.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It took less time than I expected.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It took less time than I expected.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that something took less time than expected.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that something took less time than expected.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
